name: Delivery To The Underpass
description:
One of the few able bodied robots in your motherload, you've been tasked to make an important delivery to your fellows at the underpass. It'll be the first time you've travelled through the old ruins of the human world though...

Controls:
A,D - Move Left/Right
Space - Jump
R - Return to previous Checkpoint
Escape - Pause Game (Quit Game after ending)

Font created by Geronimo. Can be found and downloaded here: www.dafont.com/gameplay.font
